Package entity

Interface AnswerDelegate

All Superinterfaces:
Bean, com.guidewire.pl.persistence.core.BeanMethods, BundleProvider, Comparable<Bean>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Answer
@Generated(value="com.guidewire.pl.metadata.codegen.Codegen", comments="AnswerDelegate.eti;AnswerDelegate.eix;AnswerDelegate.etx") public interface AnswerDelegate extends Bean
AnswerDelegate Text, Logical and Numeric Answers supplied in a specific Question Set. Question Sets are groupings of questions utilized in the risk qualification process or to develop supplemental underwriting information. Specific to PolicyCenter

      Gets the generic answer value. Which field gets retrieved depends on the question type.
